entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
